Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Top in soft modal jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, triangular lace cups with removable inserts, and lace under the bust and at the back.
Long-sleeved, fitted body in lace with an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, a seam at the hips and press-studs at the crotch.

Cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with narrow ribbed cuffs and front pockets. No buttons.

Negligee in patterned mesh with a push-up bra. The bra has moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and ties at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and ties at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and ties at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Bodysuit with a sewn-on bow tie, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a sewn-on waistcoat with buttons down the front, and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in a soft organic cotton blend. Long-sleeved bodysuit with a collar, shirt front, sewn-on bow tie, button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly and ribbed hems.

Jacket in a crisp cotton and nylon blend with a stand-up collar and zip and wind flap with concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest and front pockets with concealed buttons and an adjustable fastening at the cuffs. Unlined.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton. Jersey top with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder, an open chest pocket and contrasting colour neckline. Trousers in woven fabric with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly, leg pocket with a decorative button, and elasticated hems.

Padded, gently fitted jacket in woven fabric with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood, zip down the front and elastic drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, discreet side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined. Polyester filling.

Padded, gently fitted jacket in woven fabric with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood, zip down the front and elastic drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, discreet side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined. Polyester filling.

Padded, gently fitted jacket in woven fabric with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood, zip down the front and elastic drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, discreet side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined. Polyester filling.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide elasticated hem. Light support.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide elasticated hem. Light support.
Blouse and puff pants in a cotton weave. Sleeveless blouse with buttons at the back and a wide flounce at the hem. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems.
Blouse and puff pants in a cotton weave. Sleeveless blouse with buttons at the back and a wide flounce at the hem. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems.

Outdoor jacket in fast-drying, functional rustle fabric with a drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets with a press-stud and a ribbed, elasticated hem. Unlined.

Set with a sleeveless top, leggings and hairband in cotton. A-line top in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck and gathered flounce at the hem. Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in patterned jersey with a knot detail at the front and elastication at the back.

Set with a dress, gilet and a pair of leggings. Flared dress in woven fabric with front pockets, buttons at the back and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Faux fur gilet with a concealed button at the top. Lined. Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.

Set with a top and dungarees in soft cotton. Top in patterned jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder. Dungarees in a crinkled weave with flounces at the front, elastication at the back of the shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-3Y) and elasticated hems.

Set with a hooded jacket and pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Jacket with a zip down the front, chin guard, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and a jersey-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a hooded jacket and pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Jacket with a zip down the front, chin guard, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and a jersey-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Set with a long-sleeved top and trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from patterned organic cotton. Top with raglan sleeves, concealed press-studs in the side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with elasticated ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved top and trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from patterned organic cotton. Top with raglan sleeves, concealed press-studs in the side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with elasticated ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Short shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Short shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and lacing at the sides.

Long jacket in a rustle weave with a small stand-up collar and detachable, double-layered hood with ties at the front. Zip down the front, a wind flap with press-studs at the top and hem, front pockets and a loose yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
